page.title: 07RECREATION
page.content: Most of the people in Bowburn have computers some people have an Atari games machine.Most of the computers that people have a ZX 48K Spectrum and a few have Vic 20 computers.Our school has two BBC Acorns.My computer is a Vic 20 and I have seven games for it.We have just bought an 8K and a 16K ram pack.This gives the computer a larger memory and now we can type in programs out of computer books we have just bought.Stuart Haigh has also a VIC 20 so we usually swap games.We are thinking of selling our computer and buying a Spectrum 48K,but we changed our minds and we are keeping our VIC 20 instead because,there are a lot more programs which we have not typed in yet.
